DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the telephone-delivered Minimal Psychological Intervention (MPI) could improve diabetes' depressive symptom and diabetes-related immediately , as well as HbA1c level in the long-term.
DOC.brief_title: Minimal Psychological Intervention in Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Diabetes disease Were using antidepression medication With ongoing psychological/psychiatric treatment Had been diagnosed with psychosis (ex. schizophrenia or bipolar disorder) Had severe cognitive problem or hearing impairment Lost their partner within three months
